geogebra.name: Creating Rectangles
geogebra.intro:
Task A: Create rectangles with whole number side lengths, with an area of 36 square units. When you’re certain you have all possible rectangles, find the perimeter of each.

Task B: Create rectangles with whole number side lengths, with a perimeter of 24 units. When you’re certain you have all possible rectangles, find the area of each.

Tips for using the grid below: (from GeoGebra)

  • To zoom in or out, click on the grid and use your mouse or touchpad.
  • To pan left/right or up/down, press and hold the Shift key while using your mouse or touchpad.
